Introduction

B-Bomb is a South Korean singer and dancer under Seven Seasons. He is the sub-vocalist and main dancer of the boy group Block B and member of their sub-unit Block B BASTARZ.

In July 2, 2019 He made his solo debut with the mini album "Dawn".
